name: Naked Skater: Chick Edition
description:
*** CAUTION: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE AND REALLY HARD ***

Are you ready for the ultimate Naked Skating challenge?

If you like Naked Skater : Chick Edition try out Naked Skater : Bro Edition!

The new Naked Skater Chick Edition is now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad!

Tap on your device to make your Chick ollie over the jumps. Keep on avoiding obstacles to level up and lose items of clothing!

PLUS... Smash your friends high score in Game Center! How high a score can you get??

There are 10 items of closing to take off:
- Pink Flower (2 jumps)
- Wooly Hat (4 jumps)
- Leather Belt (7 jumps)
- White and Pink Shoes (10 jumps)
- Peace Long Sleeved Top (15 jumps) PLUS a Scene Change!!
- Denim Skirt (20 jumps)
- Bra (30 jumps)
- Little Pink Pants (50 jumps)

and..... way more upgrades to come!

Good Luck!!
